Function Documentation

FT_Long loadFontFromFile ( const char *  filePath,
uint8_t **  fontData 
)

Loads a font from the provided font path into the supplied font data buffer.

This routine reads in a TypeType font file from the provided file path and loads it into the supplied font data buffer. Note that it is the user's responsibility to free the supplied buffer once it is no longer needed. Also note that this routine is for example purposes only and any actual production code should be much more robust in its error checking.

Parameters:
filePath Path to the TrueType font including the file name.
fontData A pointer to the font buffer which will hold the file data.
Returns:
The size of the TrueType font file which was loaded.
int main ( int  argc,
char **  argv 
)

Program entry point.

Program exit status code.
